trainer_portal_desc: Manage your training business and clients
practitioner_portal_desc: Manage your health practice and patients
application_desc: Submit your application to become a certified professional on our platform
bio_placeholder: Tell potential clients about your experience, philosophy, and approach...
specialties_placeholder: e.g., Weight Loss, Strength Training, Yoga
documents_desc: Upload your certifications, licenses, and proof of credentials
document_uploaded_desc: Your document has been uploaded successfully
application_submitted_desc: We'll review your application and get back to you soon
client_added_desc: {{name}} has been added to your clients
profile_updated_desc: Your professional profile has been updated
premium_required_desc: Professional portals are available for VIP and premium members
coach_dashboard_desc: Monitor your clients' progress and provide guidance
coach_access_required_desc: You need to be an approved coach or trainer to access this dashboard.
no_active_clients: No active clients yet. Share your coach code to get started.
select_client: Select a client to view their recent trends.
secure_notes_desc: This area will be wired to xx network's cMixx for metadata-protected messaging between you and your client.
invite_codes_desc: Share your invite code with clients to connect with them
share_code_instruction: Share this code with clients or send them the link to connect with you
no_active_code: You don't have an active invite code
pending_requests_desc: Professionals who want to connect with you
coach_consent_text: By accepting, you allow {{name}} (your Coach) to view your Functional Index scores, workout trends, and activity summaries. They will NOT have access to your medical records, personal messages, or payment information.
clinician_consent_text: By accepting, you allow {{name}} (your Healthcare Provider) to view your Functional Index scores, wellness trends, and recovery summaries. They will NOT have access to your personal messages or payment information.
consent_checkbox_text: I understand and consent to sharing the listed data with this professional
join_by_code_desc: Enter an invite code from your coach or healthcare provider
enter_code_from_role: Enter an invite code from your {{role}}
request_already_pending: You already have a pending request with this professional
already_connected: You're already connected with this professional
my_care_team_desc: Manage your connected coaches and healthcare providers
connect_professional_desc: Connect with a coach or healthcare provider using their invite code
no_professionals_connected: You haven't connected with any professionals yet. Enter an invite code to get started.
revoke_access_desc: Are you sure you want to revoke access for {{name}}? They will no longer be able to view your health data.
invite_code_desc: Share this code with clients to connect with them
care_team_description: Connect with coaches and clinicians who can see your functional wellness index and trends — without exposing your raw health logs.
coach_connect_prompt: Have a trainer or coach? Enter their invite code to connect.
clinician_connect_prompt: Working with a doctor or clinician? Enter their invite code to share your trends.
professional_tools_desc: As a {{role}}, you can view aggregated functional trends for people who connect to you from your dashboard. Secure messaging is routed via xx network's cMix for metadata protection.
data_visibility_none: Right now, only you can see your detailed logs and functional wellness index. If you decide to connect a coach or clinician later, you'll choose who to share with from this screen.
data_visibility_intro: The following professionals can access your functional wellness index and high-level trends. They do not see raw meal logs, workout notes, or medical documents by default.
coach_data_access: can view your functional scores, adherence, and trends to support your training plan.
clinician_data_access: can view your functional index and trend summaries to support clinical decision-making, not to replace diagnosis.
data_revoke_note: You can revoke access at any time from this Care Team screen. Secure messaging uses end-to-end encryption and xx network's cMix for metadata protection.
care_team_banner_desc: Your functional index is shared with your care team
certification_description: Complete our 1-hour training to become a Wellio Certified Coach. Learn to leverage the Functional Wellness Index, support client adherence, and deliver privacy-first coaching.
learn_fwi_interpretation: Interpret FWI scores and trends for actionable insights
learn_adherence_patterns: Identify adherence patterns and support consistency
certification_cta_description: Complete the certification to unlock your Wellio Certified Coach badge, directory listing, and priority support.
